projects.name: M.A.R.K
projects.description: With the idea to leverage the power of Wi-Fi hotspots, which have already proven capable of transferring media through apps like Shareit, SendAnywhere, and Xender. M.A.R.K was developed, a Raspberry Pi-based home media server and a network-attached storage all in one made possible with docker microservices.

projects.name: Svelteify
projects.description: With the idea to store images and files in IndexedDB for offline caching, Svelteify was born, borrowing inspiration from a mobile-friendly design using SvelteKit, Firebase, and Indexed DB.

projects.name: Design of Smart Attachment for Refrigerator
projects.description: With an idea to simplify the online shopping experience, a smart iot attachment was developed with web scrapping, grocery detection model, IBM cloud, and React-based user interface.
